title: Bounty Star
author: Bounty Star
content: WEBSITE  -  WHITEPAPER - TELEGRAM - TWITTER1. Bounty campaign will be managed by BountyStar.2.  $15000 worth of $SUGAR are allocated for this Bounty.3. The bounty program was launched on 05.02.2023 and will run until 17.03.2023Disclaimer: By agreeing to participate in this bounty, you acknowledge that the wallet address and the email address you submitted are final and can't be changed, bounty manager reserves the right to make changes to the conditions at any time.BountyStar team can't assure the project's success as our duty is to provide a bounty management service for them as freelancers. We are responsible only for managing the campaign. We are not responsible for the project's success and continuity. Participating in this bounty campaign or investing in it will be at your own risk.Note: Campaign Distribution will be done by project team after end of campaign.1. All participants must join the SugarYield's official Telegram group and visit the SugarYield's PinkSale.2. All participants must join BountyStar's  Telegram Group.3. Talking about the bounty in the project chat group will lead to immediate disqualification from the campaign and an instant ban from the company chat group. Please ask your bounty-related questions in the BountyStar's Group.4. KYC is not required for the bounty campaign. However, the project's team has the right to require KYC for suspicious cases.5. Please note that any offensive or inappropriate behavior will lead to immediate disqualification from the campaign.6. Using multiple accounts, cheating and spamming are not allowed.7. All participants must send the Proof of Authentication post to join the bounty program.Proof Of Registration Post Format: Code:#PROOF OF REGISTRATIONForum Username:Forum Profile Link:Telegram Username:Participated Campaigns:BSC Wallet Address:App Download     20%Twitter            30%TikTok            20% YouTube         20%Reddit             10%Week 1 (05.02 - 11.02)Week 2 (12.02 - 18.02)Week 3 (19.02 - 25.02)Week 4 (26.02 - 03.03)Week 5 (04.03 - 10.03)Week 6 (11.03 - 17.03)Submit your weekly report on bounty thread.Complaint missing stakes or other problem by complaint form below.Complaint FormComplaint SpreadsheetNote: Complaints will be checked every week.Rewards:  1. 5 stakes/ OnceRules:  1. All Participants need to visit SugarYield's Fair Launch and have to take a screenshot.2. All Participants need to Download SugarYield's mobile app. Available for Android and have to take a screenshot.How to join:1. Join the SugarYield's official Telegram group and visit PinkSale.2. All participants must join BountyStar's  Telegram Group.3. Fill the registration form:Rewards:  1. Have more than 500 followers: 1 stake/week2. Have more than 3000 followers: 2 stakes/week3. Have more than 5000 followers: 3 stakes/week4. Have more than 10,000 followers: 5 stakes/weekRules:  1. Every participant must follow SugarYield's Twitter Page.2. Twitter accounts must have a minimum of 500 followers.3. Participants have to make 2 new tweets and 3 retweets per week (maximum 1 retweet and 1 Tweet per day).4. Time gap between 2 retweets/tweets needs to be 12 hours minimum.5. Participants must use @SugarYield @Binance $SUGAR #SugarYield #FairLaunch #Pinksale #BSC #Gems hashtags in every retweet and tweet.How to join:1. Join the SugarYield's official Telegram group and visit PinkSale.2. All participants must join BountyStar's  Telegram Group.3. Fill the registration form:Rewards:  1. Have more than 500 Karma: 1 stake/week2. Have more than 3000 Karma: 2 stakes/week3. Have more than 5000 Karma: 3 stakes/week4. Have more than 10000 Karma: 5 stakes/weekRules:  1. Participants have to follow  Reddit page and must have 500+ positive karma2. Must publish 5 articles weekly on top Reddit groups or pages.3. Posts should have a minimum of 70 characters.How to join:1. Join the SugarYield's official Telegram group and visit PinkSale.2. All participants must join BountyStar's  Telegram Group.3. Fill the registration form:Rewards:  1. Have more than 100 views: 1 stake/week2. Have more than 1000 views: 2 stakes/week3. Have more than 5000 views: 4 stakes/week4. Have more than 10,000 views: 5 stakes/week5. Have more than 50,000 views: 10 stakes/weekRules:  1. Participants must have at least 100 Followers.2. Each participant can send 1 video per week.3. Video Content must focus on a relevant topic: project features, Tokensale, latest token updates, blockchain, etc.4. Only original video content will be accepted.5. Bot voices will not be rewarded. But, a good quality animation video with bot voices will be rewarded.6. Poor quality video will not be rewarded. Stakes will be awarded based on the number of engagements and quality.7. Videos should never be removed, Removal/deletion will result in disqualification.8. All videos need to have the project's website'5. Participants must use #BSC #Gems #SugarYield's hashtags in every video.How to join:1. Join the SugarYield's official Telegram group and visit PinkSale.2. All participants must join BountyStar's  Telegram Group.3. Fill the registration form:Rewards: High quality: 5 stakes Good quality: 3 stakes Average quality: 1 stakeRules:1. Participants must have at least 100+ youtube subscribers. Videos need to be a minimum of 3 minutes in length.2. Each participant can send 1 video only.3. Video Content must focus on a relevant topic: project features,  Tokensale, latest token updates, blockchain, etc.4. Only original video content will be accepted.5. Face cam video will be highly recommended and considered. 6. Bot voices will not be rewarded. But, a good quality animation video with bot voices will be rewarded.7. Poor quality video will not be rewarded. Stakes will be awarded based on the number of engagements and quality.8. Videos should never be removed, Removal/deletion will result in disqualification.9. All videos need to have the project's website,Medium page, Twitter page, Telegram group, YouTube channel, or any other social media.10. Please provide the wallet address and enough details of the producer (bounty hunter) at the end of the video to ensure athenticity. This will be verified!How to join:1. Join the SugarYield's official Telegram group and visit PinkSale.2. All participants must join BountyStar's  Telegram Group.3. Fill the registration form:
